verses.verse: And now <S%H3548><s%>, O ye priests, this commandment is for you <S%H4687><s%>.

If ye will not hear <S%H8085><s%>, and if ye will not lay <S%H7760><s%> it to heart <S%H3820><s%>, to give <S%H5414><s%> glory <S%H3519><s%> unto my name <S%H8034><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, then will I send <S%H7971><s%> the curse <S%H3994><s%> upon you <S%H779><s%>, and I will curse your blessings <S%H1293><s%>; yea <S%H779><s%>, I have cursed them already <S%H7760><s%>, because ye do not lay it to heart <S%H3820><s%>.

Behold <S%H1605><s%>, I will rebuke your seed <S%H2233><s%>, and will spread <S%H2219><s%> dung <S%H6569><s%> upon your faces <S%H6440><s%>, even the dung <S%H6569><s%> of your feasts <S%H2282><s%>; and ye shall be taken away with it <S%H5375><s%>.

And ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I have sent <S%H7971><s%> this commandment <S%H4687><s%> unto you <S%H1285><s%>, that my covenant may be with Levi <S%H3878><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>.

My covenant <S%H1285><s%> was with him of life <S%H2416><s%> and peace <S%H7965><s%>; and I gave <S%H5414><s%> them to him that he might fear <S%H4172><s%>; and he feared <S%H3372><s%> me <S%H6440><s%>, and stood in awe <S%H2865><s%> of my name <S%H8034><s%>.

The law <S%H8451><s%> of truth <S%H571><s%> was in his mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and unrighteousness <S%H5766><s%> was not found <S%H4672><s%> in his lips <S%H8193><s%>: he walked <S%H1980><s%> with me in peace <S%H7965><s%> and uprightness <S%H4334><s%>, and turned <S%H7725><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> away <S%H7725><s%> from iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.

For the priest <S%H3548><s%>'s lips <S%H8193><s%> should keep <S%H8104><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%>, and they should seek <S%H1245><s%> the law <S%H8451><s%> at his mouth <S%H6310><s%>; for he is the messenger <S%H4397><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>.

But ye are turned <S%H5493><s%> aside out of the way <S%H1870><s%>; ye have caused many <S%H7227><s%> to stumble <S%H3782><s%> in the law <S%H8451><s%>; ye have corrupted <S%H7843><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>.

Therefore have I also made <S%H5414><s%> you contemptible <S%H959><s%> and base <S%H8217><s%> before all the people <S%H5971><s%>, according <S%H6310><s%> as ye have not kept <S%H8104><s%> my ways <S%H1870><s%>, but have had respect <S%H5375><s%> of persons in the law <S%H8451><s%>.

Have we not all one <S%H259><s%> father <S%H1><s%>? hath not one <S%H259><s%> God <S%H410><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> us <S%H898><s%>? why do we deal treacherously every man <S%H376><s%> against his brother <S%H251><s%>, profaning <S%H2490><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of our fathers <S%H1><s%>?

Judah <S%H3063><s%> hath dealt treacherously <S%H898><s%>, and an abomination <S%H8441><s%> is committed <S%H6213><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%> and in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>; for Judah <S%H3063><s%> hath profaned <S%H2490><s%> the holiness <S%H6944><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> which he loveth <S%H157><s%>, and hath married <S%H1166><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of a foreign <S%H5236><s%> god <S%H410><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will cut off <S%H3772><s%>, to the man <S%H376><s%> that doeth <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H5782><s%>, him that waketh and him that answereth <S%H6030><s%>, out of the tents <S%H168><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, and him that offereth <S%H5066><s%> an offering <S%H4503><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>.

And this again <S%H8145><s%> ye do <S%H6213><s%>: ye cover <S%H3680><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> with tears <S%H1832><s%>, with weeping <S%H1065><s%>, and with sighing <S%H603><s%>, insomuch that he regardeth <S%H6437><s%> not the offering <S%H4503><s%> any more <S%H3947><s%>, neither receiveth it with good will <S%H7522><s%> at your hand <S%H3027><s%>.

Yet ye say <S%H559><s%>, Wherefore <S%H4100><s%>? Because Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath been witness <S%H5749><s%> between thee and the wife <S%H802><s%> of thy youth <S%H5271><s%>, against whom thou hast dealt treacherously <S%H898><s%>, though she is thy companion <S%H2278><s%>, and the wife <S%H802><s%> of thy covenant <S%H1285><s%>.

And did he not make <S%H6213><s%> one <S%H259><s%>, although he had the residue <S%H7605><s%> of the Spirit <S%H7307><s%>? And wherefore one <S%H259><s%>? He sought <S%H1245><s%> a godly <S%H430><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%>. Therefore take heed <S%H8104><s%> to your spirit <S%H7307><s%>, and let none deal treacherously <S%H898><s%> against the wife <S%H802><s%> of his youth <S%H5271><s%>.

For I hate <S%H8130><s%> putting away <S%H7971><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and him that covereth <S%H3680><s%> his garment <S%H3830><s%> with violence <S%H2555><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>: therefore take heed <S%H8104><s%> to your spirit <S%H7307><s%>, that ye deal not treacherously <S%H898><s%>.

Ye have wearied <S%H3021><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> with your words <S%H1697><s%>. Yet ye say <S%H559><s%>, Wherein have we wearied <S%H3021><s%> him <S%H559><s%>? In that ye say, Every one that doeth <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and he delighteth <S%H2654><s%> in them <S%H430><s%>; or where is the God of justice <S%H4941><s%>?
